casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Anthony SCATURRO, Jr. 207P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 23, 2017 Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Scaturro, Michael Anthony (Jr.). Anne Goco Kirby, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of June 2017."
